Description: AWS CloudFormation template to create an AD Connector and related resources.

VpcId.Description: The VPC ID for the AD Connector.

SubnetIds.Description: The list of subnet IDs for the AD Connector.

ADConnectorName.Description: The name of the AD Connector.

DirectoryDnsServers.Description: Comma-separated list of DNS servers for the on-premises domain.

Password.Description: The password for the AD Connector's service account.

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for domain member instances

UserData.Fn::Base64:
<powershell>
            # Join Domain Script for Windows
            Add-Computer -DomainName 'yourdomain.com' -Credential (New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential('domain\user', (ConvertTo-SecureString -String 'password' -AsPlainText -Force))) -Restart
            </powershell>

ADConnectorId.Description: ID of the created AD Connector

DHCPOptionSetId.Description: ID of the created DHCP Option Set

DomainMembersSGId.Description: ID of the created Security Group for domain members
